t:
The story you read was wrong. The girl's hood was not red, instead, the forest around her was. From the ground to the trees and their leaves, everything was red.

When the wolf came and saw all the blood-red colors around him, he was surprised. He thought that he can surely find food here, and then he saw the girl.

Another mistake was with the woodcutter, he never existed.
The only human there was the girl, eager to show the wolf how she kept the forest so red.
c:
Another mistake was that the wolf ate the girl. It was actually the opposite.

Rewriting the ‘Little Red Riding Hood’.
